SEARCH
Package klab.app

Class ReceiveRunner

java.lang.Object
klab.app.ReceiveRunner
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ReceiveRunner extends Object implements Runnable
ReceiveRunner class which implements runnable to decode Response and Search objects to the socket
